summary: Spurdo Sparde - The Missing Link Between Pepe and Apu - Spurdo Sparde is the missing link between Pepe and Apu, an essential and inspirational figure that ties together the holy trinity and whose market cap potential is enormous and has yet to be capitalized on. Building an enthusiastic community from the ground up we will bring awareness to Spurdo Sparde as a character, as a meme, and as the third link in the trio that renders Pepe The Frog as the 3Dimensional hero that all we know and love.
